name: Idle Breaker: Loot and Survive
summary:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic world where the undead roam! Embrace the thrill of smashing through everything in sight, from shattering windows to crumbling the buildings, all while scavenging for vital resources.

Brace yourself against hordes of zombies as you unleash your inner survivor. Gear up with crafty makeshift weapons, upgrade them and make the undead tremble!
